description: Public Services and Procurement Canada is seeking to negotiate a regional master standing offer contract agreement. full_summary:
=====================

### EZ156-230001: Catering Services

**Reference Number**: WS4107322252-Doc4107478517
**Amendment Number**: 1
**Solicitation Number**: WS4107322252

#### Tender Details

* **Publication Date**: 2023-07-20
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-08-04 14:00:00
* **Amendment Date**: 2023-07-21
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2023-08-17
* **Expected Contract End Date**: None

#### Tender Status and Type

* **Tender Status**: Expired
* **Notice Type**: Request for Standing Offer

#### Procurement Information

* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: Listed below
	+ Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
	+ World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
	+ Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
	+ Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
	+ Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
	+ Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
	+ Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
	+ Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
	+ North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
	+ Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: None
* **Regions of Delivery**: British Columbia

#### Service Description

Public Services and Procurement Canada is establishing Regional Master Standing Offers (RMSO) for use by all departments (notably DND and RCMP) in British Columbia and Yukon Territory. The location of the work will be in the Okanagan, Lower Mainland, Nanaimo, and Northern BC areas. Services will include the delivery and supply of hot and cold meals, both dispersed and served cafeteria style. Note that this contract has expired. 

Please contact Thomas Leboeuf at thomas.leboeuf@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca for further information. No attachments were made available online. 

Please visit the Ariba Discovery website at http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16922456?extsite=MTY5
